name: Tomedes Translation & Localization Service
tag_list: localization, translation, software-localization, website-localization, video-game-localization, document-translation, it-localization, business-globalization
overview:
Providing services within localization, translation and globalization, Tomedes offers translations and complex localization services for software, websites and e-commerce, localization for video games and information technology, as well as traditional document translation services.

Tomedes language services include highly specialized translation services for specific industry documents and projects. Among these are technical medical translation, legal translation, engineering and manufacturing, Information Technology localization and translation, business globalization and much more.

Translation and localization services are provided for more than 100 languages, with advanced translation and localization expertise in Middle Eastern languages, including Russian, Turkish, Arabic, Farsi, Persian, Armenian, and many others. Middle Eastern languages are among those translated the most prolifically, though Tomedes provides superb translation services for all major languages .
